name: Coleslaw With Lobster
keywords: cabbage, lobster, mayonnaise, raw, side dish, summer
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup lobster meat, cut into 1/4-inch cubes, approximately 1/4 pound

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the cabbage in half, slicing through the core. Cut away and discard the core and any tough or blemished outer leaves. Finely shred enough of the cabbage to make about three cups. Reserve the remainder of the cabbage for future use.
Coarsely chop the cabbage shreds and put them in a mixing bowl.
In another mixing bowl blend the mayonnaise with the lemon juice, Tabasco sauce, onions, salt and pepper and stir in the lobster meat. Pour the mixture over the cabbage and toss well.
